member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER
member.summary: Identifiers for various global counters, or shared variables. Each global counter can be incremented or decremented using and .

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_SEARCHMANAGER
member.summary: The global counter for use with the .

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_SEARCHOPTIONS
member.summary: The global counter for use with to identify whether a query parser's settings have changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_FOLDERSETTINGSCHANGE
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether folder settings have changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_RATINGS
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether ratings have changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_APPROVEDSITES
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether approved sites have changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_RESTRICTIONS
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether restrictions have changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_SHELLSETTINGSCHANGED
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether Shell settings have changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_SYSTEMPIDLCHANGE
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether a system PIDL has changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_OVERLAYMANAGER
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether the overlay manager state has changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_QUERYASSOCIATIONS
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether query associations have changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_IESESSIONS
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether the number of IE sessions has changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_IEONLY_SESSIONS
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether the number of IE sessions has changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_APPLICATION_DESTINATIONS
member.summary: Identifies The global counter used to identify whether applications have been added or removed from the system.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.__UNUSED_RECYCLE_WAS_GLOBALCOUNTER_CSCSYNCINPROGRESS
member.summary: Unused.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_RECYCLEBINENUM
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether the Recycle Bin settings have changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_RECYCLEBINCORRUPTED
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether a Recycle Bin has been deleted.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_RATINGS_STATECOUNTER
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether ratings have changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_PRIVATE_PROFILE_CACHE
member.summary: The global counter state.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_INTERNETTOOLBAR_LAYOUT
member.summary: The global counter used to identify whether the Internet toolbar layout has changed.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_FOLDERDEFINITION_CACHE
member.summary: The global counter used to identify changes to the folder definition cache.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_COMMONPLACES_LIST_CACHE
member.summary: The global counter used to identify state changes for the commonplaces list cache.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_PRIVATE_PROFILE_CACHE_MACHINEWIDE
member.summary: The global counter state, machine-wide.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_ASSOCCHANGED
member.summary: The global counter used to identify the current GlobalAssocChangedCounter registry value for HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_APP_ITEMS_STATE_STORE_CACHE
member.summary: Introduced in Windows 8. The global counter used to identify whether the Store is current.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_SETTINGSYNC_ENABLED
member.summary: Introduced in Windows 8. The global counter used to determine whether sync is enabled or disabled.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_APPSFOLDER_FILETYPEASSOCIATION_COUNTER
member.summary: Introduced in Windows 8. The global counter used to identify the current FTACounter registry value for HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\ImmersiveShell\StateStore.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_USERINFOCHANGED
member.summary: Introduced in Windows 8. The global counter used to identify user info change state.

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_SYNC_ENGINE_INFORMATION_CACHE_MACHINEWIDE
member.summary: Introduced in Windows 8.1. The global counter used to identify sync engine counter state, machine wide..

member.name: SHGLOBALCOUNTER.GLOBALCOUNTER_MAXIMUMVALUE
member.summary: The maximum value any shared variable can have.
